interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Touchland Disney Hydrating Hand Sanitizer | Limited Edition Mickey Mouse | Citrus, Lavender, Aloe, Unscented | 500-Sprays each, 1FL OZ (Set of 4) Review Date: 2022/06/22 Store: Touchland Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Touchland', 'Unit Count': '4 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Scent': 'Disney 4-pack', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Package Dimensions': '10.39 x 10.31 x 1.54 inches; 1.04 Pounds', 'UPC': '850028448243', 'Manufacturer': 'Touchland'} Review Text: I love travel sized anything. I have 4 kids. Hand sanitizers are a must. These are absolutely adorable.

Let’s start with the packaging. It’s not just regular sanitizer thrown in a box and sent out. This looks like a promo box. It’s adorable!! The box’s sides slide outward!! (This actually took me a bit to figure out on my own but mannnnnn was it worth it. It’s adorable!!) The box opens up to 4 sanitizers, all different colors, and a Mickey Mouse logo in the middle… so you know it’s real ;) They sanitizers are all spray, Each a different scent. (Lavender, citrus, aloe and unscented) and each are supposedly worth 500 sprays. I love these. The aesthetics, The style, the scent, THE MICKEY!! Just everything yes!! It is a little pricey but honestly, and I don’t say this much about beauty products let alone hand sanitizer, I’d spend the money for it. 500 sprays && Mickey???!! (Can you tell I’m a Mickey fan?) I give this 2 thumbs up. 5 stars! Review Title: Anything Mickey is worth it but these… can’t live without it now Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Aubss 20Pcs Colors Gel Nail Polish Kit with Glossy & Matte Top Coat and 2Pcs Base Coat, Rainbow Colors Skin Tones Yellow Red Gel Polish for All Reason, Gel Nail Kit for Women Girls Christmas Gift AUBSS {'Brand': 'AUBSS', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': '003', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '25', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.87 x 5.51 x 2.76 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.51 x 2.76 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'AUBSS'} I love the variety of this set. I have 2 daughters but also many nieces and they love having nail salon parties. This set gives me not only the base and top coats but also a HUGE variety of colors to choose from. Polish goes on great and looks perfect! Gorgeous colors! Ethique Quench Lightweight Solid Face Moisturizer Tube for Oily to Balanced Skin - Plastic-Free, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Eco-Friendly, 2.29 oz (Pack of 1) Ethique {'Brand': 'Ethique', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Unit Count': '2.29 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '3.54 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Quench Bar Solid Face Moisturiser', 'UPC': '810003557681'} Absolutely love the concept of this product. A balm that you can easily apply to your face without having to get your hands dirty AND biodegradable packaging. A sure yes please, or so you’d think. Upon opening, I found the packaging to be great. The push up concept was great as well. Innovative and a great selling point. It had no real smell to it when I opened it but about an hour after applying it to my face, you could start to smell what smelt like an old lotion that’s sat around since my mother’s childhood. It was almost dusty of a smell. It also felt a bit greasy/oily. My face does feel smoother though after whipping it off though. Really wish I could love this product. Love the concept but not the product AOA Studio Collection Makeup Sponge Set Makeup Blender Latex Free and High-definition Set of 5 Makeup Blender For Powder Cream and Liquid, Super Soft Wonder Blender Beauty Cosmetic Beveled AOA STUDIO {'Brand': 'AOA STUDIO', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.39 x 1.97 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022931338'} Durable and flexible enough for your makeup needs. Applied make up smoothly and blots great. Enough absorption to hold foundation but not make it soggy. Individually wrapped. Works great Flexible Makeup Headband - 3PCS Spa Headband For Washing Face Skincare Towel Headbands Shower Hair Band Tinpin {'Color': 'Pink,Silver', 'Material': 'Foam', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Brand': 'Tinpin', 'Size': '3 piece Set', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 7.17 x 2.13 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} I got this 3 pack for my daughters and I in hopes it’d fit all of us and IT DOES! My daughters are 4 and 8 so I was reaching for it to be able to fit so I’m very impressed it does. Perfect to hold our hair back when doing face masks or facials. Looks great and really comfortable. Stretchy and comfy! Cfalaicos Women Short Curly Bob Wavy Wig for Cosplay Party Halloween Heat Resistant Wigs Full Head Wig with Free Wig Cap (Rainbow) Cfalaicos {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '14 x 10 x 10 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'Cfalaicos', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '14 x 10 x 10 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} I have a hard time committing to different hair color changes so wigs help fulfill my color obsessions without the commitment. This wig is soo much fun! It has an adjustable strap on the bottom of the wig easily making it able to fit myself as well as my daughters. The colors are exactly as pictured and quality is great for the $17 pricing. This wig also comes with a wig cap. I have extremely long hair and this wig does a great job holding and hiding it. Love it. Would recommend So Much Fun! Touchland Disney Hydrating Hand Sanitizer | Limited Edition Mickey Mouse | Citrus, Lavender, Aloe, Unscented | 500-Sprays each, 1FL OZ (Set of 4) Touchland {'Brand': 'Touchland', 'Unit Count': '4 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Scent': 'Disney 4-pack', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Package Dimensions': '10.39 x 10.31 x 1.54 inches; 1.04 Pounds', 'UPC': '850028448243', 'Manufacturer': 'Touchland'} I love travel sized anything. I have 4 kids. Hand sanitizers are a must. These are absolutely adorable.

Let’s start with the packaging. It’s not just regular sanitizer thrown in a box and sent out. This looks like a promo box. It’s adorable!! The box’s sides slide outward!! (This actually took me a bit to figure out on my own but mannnnnn was it worth it. It’s adorable!!) The box opens up to 4 sanitizers, all different colors, and a Mickey Mouse logo in the middle… so you know it’s real ;) They sanitizers are all spray, Each a different scent. (Lavender, citrus, aloe and unscented) and each are supposedly worth 500 sprays. I love these. The aesthetics, The style, the scent, THE MICKEY!! Just everything yes!! It is a little pricey but honestly, and I don’t say this much about beauty products let alone hand sanitizer, I’d spend the money for it. 500 sprays && Mickey???!! (Can you tell I’m a Mickey fan?) I give this 2 thumbs up. 5 stars! Anything Mickey is worth it but these… can’t live without it now
profile:
User Summary:

- **Family-Oriented**: The user prioritizes products that can be enjoyed with family, especially her daughters and nieces, emphasizing bonding experiences through self-care activities. Her recent purchase reflects a focus on family-friendly items that are both functional and appealing.

- **Variety Preference**: Showcasing a strong appreciation for diverse options, she loves creativity and choice in her product selections, as highlighted by her interest in colorful aesthetics.

- **Quality and Performance**: The user remains discerning about product efficacy, valuing high-quality items with excellent performance, which is crucial for her active family lifestyle.

- **Nail Art Enthusiast**: Her passion for beauty is evident through hosting creative self-care activities like nail salon parties, reinforcing her dedication to fun family experiences.

- **Gift Consideration**: Thoughtful in her selections for family and friends, she favors products suitable for gifting, particularly those that are memorable and unique.

- **Eco-Consciousness**: A growing interest in eco-friendly products reflects her commitment to sustainability, blending beauty with ethical considerations.

- **Makeup Tools and Self-Care**: She values effective and comfortable beauty tools, enhancing her beauty routine with functionality in mind.

- **Color Experimentation with Hair**: Enjoying hair color experimentation, her use of wigs allows for fun, adjustable looks, fostering shared experiences with her daughters.

Overall, the user embodies a creative, family-oriented individual who values quality, variety, and shared beauty experiences, with a commitment to sustainability and thoughtful gifting.
